using System.Collections;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;

namespace Example
{
	/// <inheritdoc cref="IReadOnlyList{T}" />
	public partial class DemoClass : IReadOnlyList<Foo>
	{
		public DemoClass(IEnumerable<Foo> items) =>
			_items = items?.ToArray() ?? throw new System.ArgumentNullException(nameof(items));

		/// <inheritdoc cref="IReadOnlyList{T}" />
		public IEnumerator<Foo> GetEnumerator() => _items.GetEnumerator();

		/// <inheritdoc cref="IEnumerable" />
		IEnumerator IEnumerable.GetEnumerator() => GetEnumerator();

		/// <inheritdoc cref="IReadOnlyCollection{T}" />
		public int Count => _items.Count;

		/// <inheritdoc cref="IReadOnlyList{T}" />
		public Foo this[int index] => _items[index];

		private readonly IReadOnlyList<Foo> _items;
	}
}
